text: At the Spanish Red Cross,
our mission is simple.
No one should feel alone.

We are committed
to support those who need it most.

Especially the growing population
of elderly people in Spain.

Our team works
to reduce loneliness,

ensuring that
every person has access
to someone who cares about them.

We are using
AWS cloud, integrated with
with IoT devices

to power our
Tele-Assistance program
that enables services

such as alarms monitoring
and setting reminders
for daily tasks.
Currently, the project has

assisted more than
180,000 older adults.
We see AWS as a long-term partner

to help us continue innovating
in the care of the elderly,

using generative
artificial intelligence,
and everything in the cloud.
Our mission

for the future is to ensure
that every elderly person
can live with dignity,

supported by technology
that empowers them

to feel connected,
safe and valued.
We are excited to continue

our collaboration with 
Amazon Web Services
to make this future a reality.
